sentences.en: A medicinal lotion applied to the eye; eyewash.
sentences.cn: 洗眼药用于眼睛的药液; 洗眼药.

sentences.en: He said most of my theory is eyewash.
sentences.cn: 他说我的理论大多数是一派胡言.

sentences.en: Locate other safety equipment such as fire extinguishers, eyewash stations, and showers at appropriate locations.
sentences.cn: 把其它安全装置,如灭火器 、 眼站和淋浴安排在合适的位置.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the relation between conjunctival congestion pain and eyewash in patient after lasik.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨患者结膜充血和疼痛感与洗眼液的关系.

sentences.en: Type FP valves installed on emergency shower and eyewash station.
sentences.cn: FP阀用于紧急淋浴和洗眼器.

sentences.en: We still encounter case of pilfering, eyewash and bureaucratism.
sentences.cn: 我们还会发现小偷小摸 、 吹牛拍马以及官僚主义的种种现象.

sentences.en: When you keep skinned, you'll find it to be a counterfeit eyewash.
sentences.cn: 你要是留意, 就会发现这是一种伪造的眼药水.

sentences.en: When you keep your eyes skinned , you'll find it to be a counterfeit eyewash.
sentences.cn: 当你保持你的眼睛闪亮时(聪明、慧眼), 你将会发现这是个骗局.

words.tran_cn: 无稽之谈；骗局；洗眼水；表面文章

trans.tran_cn: 洗眼水，<俚>胡话，空话，拍马
trans.tran_en: a mild solution for applying to the eyes for relief of irritation, etc
